language.restart_required: Language changes will take effect after restarting the application.
language.help_text: Select your preferred language for the interface.
language.restart_notice: Language change will take effect after restarting the application.

dialogs.sponsorblock_description:
Select which types of video segments to automatically remove during download.
SponsorBlock uses community-submitted data to identify these segments.

cookies.help_text:
Choose how to provide cookies for logging in.
This allows downloading of private videos and premium quality audio.
cookies.browser_help: Select the browser to extract cookies from:
cookies.browser_extract_message: Browser cookies will be extracted when applied
cookies.file_selected_message: Cookie file selected - Click OK to apply

custom_command.help_text:
Enter your custom yt-dlp command below. The current URL will be appended automatically.

For the full list of options and usage examples, click here to view the official yt-dlp documentation.

Note: Download path and filename template will be handled automatically.
custom_command.input_placeholder:
Enter yt-dlp arguments here...

e.g. --extract-audio --audio-format mp3
custom_command.command_help:
Available placeholders:
{url} - Video URL
{output} - Output directory

Example: --write-info-json --write-thumbnail

proxy.help_text: Configure proxy settings for downloading. Leave empty to use direct connection.
proxy.main_proxy_help: Primary proxy server for all downloads. Supports HTTP/HTTPS and SOCKS5 protocols.
proxy.geo_proxy_help: Secondary proxy specifically for bypassing geographic restrictions.

download.please_set_path: Please set a download path first.
download.please_enter_url_and_path: Please enter a URL and set download path.

update.title: Update yt-dlp
update.already_up_to_date: ‚úÖ yt-dlp is already up to date!
update.update_failed: ‚ùå Failed to update yt-dlp. Please try again or check your internet connection.

about.title: About YTSage
about.description: Modern YouTube downloader with clean PySide6 interface.
about.author: By: {author}

time_range.title: Trim Video
time_range.help_text:
Set the start and end times to trim the video.
Leave empty to download the full video.
time_range.invalid_format: Invalid time format. Use HH:MM:SS format.
time_range.start_after_end: Start time cannot be after end time.

settings.title: Download Settings
settings.check_startup: Check on every startup (minimum 1 hour between checks)
settings.could_not_determine_version: Could not determine current yt-dlp version.
settings.up_to_date_dialog:
yt-dlp is up to date!

Current version: {version}
settings.settings_saved_message: Auto-update settings have been saved successfully!
settings.auto_update_description: Configure automatic updates for yt-dlp to ensure you always have the latest features and bug fixes.

main_ui.url_placeholder: Enter YouTube video or playlist URL
main_ui.browser_cookies_selected_message: Browser cookies will be extracted from: {browser}
main_ui.error_extract_info: Error: Could not extract basic video information. Please check your link.
main_ui.analyzing_extracting_ytdlp: Analyzing (30%)... Extracting info with yt-dlp executable
main_ui.invalid_url_or_enter: Invalid URL or please enter a URL.

sponsorblock.sponsor_desc: Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements
sponsorblock.selfpromo_desc: Unpaid promotion of creators' own content
sponsorblock.interaction_desc: Asking viewers to like, subscribe, or follow social media
sponsorblock.intro_desc: Video introduction that can be skipped
sponsorblock.outro_desc: Credits or when the video ends
sponsorblock.preview_desc: Quick recap of previous videos or preview of what's coming up
sponsorblock.music_offtopic_desc: Only for music videos. Marks non-music sections
sponsorblock.filler_desc: Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor

errors.playlist_no_videos: Error: Playlist contains no valid videos.
errors.playlist_no_url: Error: Could not get URL for the first playlist video.
errors.ytdlp_not_found: Error: yt-dlp executable not found. Please install yt-dlp first.
errors.ytdlp_not_found_path: Error: yt-dlp executable not found. This could be due to improper installation or a PATH issue.
errors.no_data_returned: Error: No data returned from yt-dlp
errors.analysis_timeout: Error: Analysis timed out. Please try again.
errors.invalid_speed_limit: ‚ùå Error: Invalid speed limit value set in settings.
errors.parse_failed: Error: Failed to parse yt-dlp output: {error}

update_dialog.title: Update Available
update_dialog.new_version_available: A new version of YTSage is available!

file_exists_dialog.title: File Already Exists
file_exists_dialog.info: This video has already been downloaded.

url_validation.invalid_scheme: URL must start with http:// or https://
url_validation.unsupported_platform:
YTSage only supports YouTube and YouTube Music URLs.
The domain '{domain}' is not supported.
url_validation.invalid_youtu_be: Invalid youtu.be URL: missing video ID

ytdlp_errors.private_video:
This is a private video. You can download it by logging into your account using cookies.
Go to 'Custom Options' ‚Üí 'Login with Cookies' ‚Üí 'Extract cookies from browser' to authenticate.
ytdlp_errors.age_restricted:
This video is age-restricted. You need to be logged in to access it.
Use 'Custom Options' ‚Üí 'Login with Cookies' to authenticate with your account.
ytdlp_errors.geo_blocked:
This video is not available in your region (geo-blocked).
You may need to use a VPN or the video might be restricted in your country.
ytdlp_errors.video_unavailable:
This video has been removed or is no longer available.
The video may have been deleted by the uploader or removed due to policy violations.
ytdlp_errors.live_stream:
This is a live stream that cannot be downloaded while active.
Wait for the stream to end, then try downloading the archived version.
ytdlp_errors.playlist_error:
Unable to access this playlist. It may be private, deleted, or empty.
Check if the playlist exists and is publicly accessible.
ytdlp_errors.network_error:
Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
If the problem persists, the video server might be temporarily unavailable.
ytdlp_errors.invalid_url:
Invalid or unsupported URL. Please check the link and try again.
Make sure you're using a valid YouTube, Vimeo, or other supported platform URL.
ytdlp_errors.premium_content:
This content requires YouTube Premium or channel membership.
You need to be logged in with an account that has access to this content.
ytdlp_errors.copyright_blocked:
This video is blocked due to copyright claims.
The content owner has restricted access to this video.
ytdlp_errors.extraction_failed:
Failed to extract video information. This might be a temporary issue.
Please try again in a few minutes, or check if the video link is correct.
ytdlp_errors.generic_error:
Could not extract video information. Please check your link.
Technical details: {error}
